column1: These settings affect all members in your community.
column2: These settings affect all members in your community.
These settings are applied on a per member level basis. Start by selecting the member level you want to modify, then adjust the settings for that level below.
Do you want to let users view groups? If set to no, some other settings on this page may not apply.

column1: No, do not allow groups to be viewed.
column2: No, do not allow groups to be viewed.

column1: Yes, allow viewing and subscription of groups.
column2: Yes, allow viewing and subscription of groups.

column1: Yes, allow members to view all groups, even private ones.
column2: Yes, allow members to view all groups, even private ones.

Do you want to let users create groups? If set to no, some other settings on this page may not apply. This is useful if you want users to be able to view groups and manage their subscriptions, but only want certain levels to be able to create groups.

column1: No, do not allow groups to be created.
column2: No, do not allow groups to be created.

column1: Do you want to let users edit and delete groups?
column2: Do you want to let users edit and delete groups?

column1: No, do not allow groups to be edited.
column2: No, do not allow groups to be edited.

column1: Yes, allow  members to edit their own groups.
column2: Yes, allow  members to edit their own groups.

column1: Yes, allow members to edit everyone's groups.
column2: Yes, allow members to edit everyone's groups.
Your users can choose from any of the options checked below when they decide who can see their group. If you do not check any options, everyone will be allowed to view groups.
Your users can choose from any of the options checked below when they decide who can post to their group discussions. If you do not check any options, everyone will be allowed to post.
Your users can choose from any of the options checked below when they decide who can upload photos to their groups. If you do not check any options, all members will be allowed to upload.

column1: Are you sure that you want to delete this group? It will not be recoverable after being deleted.
column2: Are you sure that you want to delete this group? It will not be recoverable after being deleted.

column1: Are you sure you want to delete the selected groups?
column2: Are you sure you want to delete the selected groups?

This page lists all of the group entries your users have posted. You can use this page to monitor these groups and delete offensive material if necessary. Entering criteria into the filter fields will help you find specific group entries. Leaving the filter fields blank will show all the group entries on your social network.

If you want to allow your users to categorize their groups, create the categories below. This feature is useful if you want to list all your users' group that If you have no categories, your users will not be given the option of assigning a group category.

column1: Are you sure that you want to delete this category? It will not be recoverable after being deleted.
Do you want to let members delete groups? If set to no, some other settings on this page may not apply.
column2: Do you want to let members delete groups? If set to no, some other settings on this page may not apply.

column1: Yes, allow members to delete their own groups.
column2: Yes, allow members to delete their own groups.

column1: No, do not allow members to delete their groups.
column2: No, do not allow members to delete their groups.

column1: Do you want to let members of this level comment on groups?
column2: Do you want to let members of this level comment on groups?

column1: Yes, allow members to comment on groups.
column2: Yes, allow members to comment on groups.

column1: No, do not allow members to comment on groups.
column2: No, do not allow members to comment on groups.

column2: {item:$subject} has been made an officer for the group {item:$object}

column2: {item:$subject} replied to a {item:$object:topic} in the group {itemParent:$object:group}: {body:$body}

column2: {item:$subject} has {item:$object:posted} on a {itemParent:$object::group topic} you created.

column2: {item:$subject} has {item:$object:posted} on a {itemParent:$object::group topic} you posted on.

column2: {item:$subject} has invited you to the group {item:$object}.

column2: {item:$subject} has requested to join the group {item:$object}.

column2: Your request to join the group {item:$subject} has been approved.

column1: You were promoted to officer in the group {item:$object}.
column2: You were promoted to officer in the group {item:$object}.
This email is sent to the member when they are approved to join a group.
You have been approved to join the group [object_title]

[header]

You have been approved to join the group "[object_title]". Please click the following link to view it:

http://[host][object_link]

[footer]
This email is sent to the member when someone requests to join their group.
[sender_title] has requested to join the group [object_title]

[header]

[sender_title] has requested to join the group "[object_title]". Please click the following link to view it:

http://[host][object_link]

[footer]
This email is sent to the member when people reply to discussion topics that the member created.
A member has posted a reply to your topic "[object_title]" in the group "[object_parent_title]"

[header]

[sender_title] has posted a reply to your topic "[object_title]" in the group "[object_parent_title]":

"[message]"

Please click the following link to view it:

http://[host][object_link]

[footer]
This email is sent to the member when people reply to discussion topics that the member replied to.
A member has posted a reply to the topic "[object_title]" you replied to in the group "[object_parent_title]"

[header]

[sender_title] has posted a reply to the topic "[object_title]" you replied to in the group "[object_parent_title]":

"[message]"

Please click the following link to view it:

http://[host][object_link]

[footer]
This email is sent to the member when they are invited to a group.
You have been invited to join the group [object_title]

[header]

You have been invited to join the group "[object_title]". Please click the following link to view it:

http://[host][object_link]

[footer]
This email is sent when a member is promoted to officer in a group.
You have been promoted to officer in the group [object_title]

[header]

You have been promoted to officer in the group "[object_title]". Please click the following link to view it:

http://[host][object_link]

[footer]
